title: Weeknight Miso Ramen
ingredients: Sesame oil and toasted sesame seeds
steps: In a pot, saut√© garlic and ginger in a splash of oil for 1 minute. Add mushrooms and cook until softened.
Pour in broth, soy sauce, and mirin; bring to a simmer.
Whisk miso paste with a ladle of hot broth in a small bowl, then stir back into the pot (keep below a boil).
Cook noodles per package in the broth until just tender.
Add spinach to wilt. Ladle into bowls, top with soft-boiled egg halves, green onions, a drizzle of sesame oil, and sesame seeds.
notes: Keep miso from boiling to preserve flavor.
